verbose_text: Animals received a bolus of 20 mL/kg 0.9% normal saline once toxicity occurred immediately followed by equal volume amounts of either normal saline as a sham treatment, MB (1 mg/kg as a bolus and subsequent infusion), epinephrine (0.1 mug/kg/min), or MB and epinephrine.
evidence: amounts of either normal saline as a sham treatment, MB (1 mg/kg as a bolus and subsequent infusion), epinephrine (0.1 mug/kg/min), or MB
